domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

text: @MsJohnGault @EarI0fLemongrab @charlescwcooke Not a damn thing; it's deadly serious. A lot of people would have to die in short order to get there quickly. You need 60-70% to achieve. I frankly don't feel like sacrificing a large percentage of people over 60 to do it. 🤷🏽‍♀️
